{"id":1000939214,"question_id":42,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1690034550,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1000939214/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"20.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& a) {\n      int n=a.size();\n      vector<int>leftm(n);\n      leftm[0]=a[0];\n      int sum=0;\n      for(int i=1;i<n;i++){\n          leftm[i]=max(a[i],leftm[i-1]);\n      }\n      vector<int>rightm(n);\n      rightm[n-1]=a[n-1];\n      for(int i=n-2;i>=0;i--){\n          rightm[i]=max(a[i],rightm[i+1]);\n      }\n      for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n          sum+=min(leftm[i],rightm[i])-a[i];\n      }\n     return sum;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
